title: dhru9
author: dhru9
created_time: July 20, 2022, 12:15:48 PMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 03:36:39 AM by dhru9
content: Link coinriders.comWhat you will get:Domain coinriders.com (rare costs 3k for me)Code made from scratch very hq and good for SEO. (around 7-10k cost) The site has cool features and very good seo otimized for anyone who understand a little bit seo will know it. have scam, predictions and token prices lots of potential to make good traffic if you know what to do. (there are hundreds k of pages) when they get index on google it can have huge traffic.

comments.author: virasog
comments.body: Just saw your ad to see your site coinriders.com. What is your demand for your site ?Also, i remember that you started a thread Make crypto prediction and get a dollar!, where you were paying a good amount for every prediction written on your site. Also you have an ANN thread Coinriders 2.0 is here for your site. So why all of the sudden you decided to sell the site? You did not get the required traffic and engagement even after so much publicity or there is any other reason for sell. Being transparent about it will help people decide to buy the domain and site

comments.author: dhru9
comments.body: Quote from: virasog on August 05, 2022, 01:31:01 AMJust saw your ad to see your site coinriders.com. What is your demand for your site ?Also, i remember that you started a thread Make crypto prediction and get a dollar!, where you were paying a good amount for every prediction written on your site. Also you have an ANN thread Coinriders 2.0 is here for your site. So why all of the sudden you decided to sell the site? You did not get the required traffic and engagement even after so much publicity or there is any other reason for sell. Being transparent about it will help people decide to buy the domain and site  Coingecko ask unrelastic amounts for their api's. i don't think is worth my time on it given the api prices are too expensive. also is more competitive than i thought i want to close the site. if someone think he can make money with ithe is welcome. i remove the site  anyway in few days so is last days to buy it if you want before I shut it down.
